original_text: Whatever seems good to you and your brothers to do with the rest of the silver and gold, you may do, according to the will of your God.
korean_text: 그 나머지 은금은 너와 너의 형제가 좋게 여기는 일에 너희 하나님의 뜻을 따라 쓸지며

sentences.original_text: Whatever seems good to you and your brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 당신과 당신의 형제들에게 좋다고 생각되는 것은

sentences.original_text: to do with the rest of the silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 남은 은과 금으로 하고자 하는 것은

sentences.original_text: according to the will of your God.
